text.__SUMMARY__: Ixora margaretae is a species of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to New Caledonia.  It is threatened by habitat loss.
text.Further reading: Hequet, V. (2010). "Ixora margaretae". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 2010: e.T31141A9608910. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.2010-4.RLTS.T31141A9608910.en. Retrieved 11 January 2018.
